completed_tasks.notes: Created comprehensive test suite for ChatRoom model with 45 tests covering all model aspects. 44 passed, 1 skipped due to enrollment field migration status. Tests formatted with black and verified.

details.task: Adapt ASSIGNMENTS tests to real model structure

factories.py.AssignmentFactory: Fixed type and status to use enum values (Assignment.Type.HOMEWORK, Assignment.Status.DRAFT)
factories.py.AssignmentSubmissionFactory: Fixed fields - removed grade/graded_by, added score/max_score/status with correct enum

test_assignment_question_model.py.test_question_types: Changed type= to question_type=, iterate through AssignmentQuestion.Type.choices, create separate assignments per type for unique constraint

test_assignment_serializer.py.all_tests: Replaced User.objects.create() with factory calls, added start_date to all Assignment creations, replaced string enum values with Assignment.Type/Status enums

test_assignment_submission_model.py.all_tests: Replaced AssignmentSubmission.objects.create() with AssignmentSubmissionFactory, added StudentFactory import, removed UserFactory(role=student) in favor of StudentFactory()

test_attempt_model.py.test_attempt_status_choices: Fixed unique constraint by incrementing attempt_number in loop

completed_tasks.notes: Fixed UserFactory abstract flag in _initialize_factories(). Added missing line: UserFactory._meta.abstract = False at line 820. Result: 372/372 tests PASSED (0 FAILED, 0 ERROR).
